title: The Story of My Life, volumes 4-6
author: Hare, Augustus J. C. (Augustus John Cuthbert)
snippet: Then we walked on the sunnylawns swept by the massy branches of grand old cedars and intersected bythree rivers, over one of which is a beautiful Palladian bridge likethat at Prior Park.

title: Life of Johnson, Volume 5; Tour to the Hebrides (1773) and Journey into North Wales (1774)
author: Boswell, James
snippet: Warburton not onlymarried his niece, but, on his death, became in her right owner ofPrior Park.

title: Life of Johnson, Volume 5; Tour to the Hebrides (1773) and Journey into North Wales (1774)
author: Boswell, James
snippet: Allen was Ralph Allen of Prior Park near Bath, to whom Fieldingdedicated _Amelia_, and who is said to have been the original ofAllworthy in _Tom Jones_.

title: Diary, reminiscences, and correspondence of Henry Crabb Robinson ...
author: Robinson, Henry Crabb
snippet: Little more than two years since, on the day before my mari'iage, the late Bishop Baynes, at Prior Park, pleased me much by his civilities, but most by showing me the little pencil sketch (often engraved) taken by stealth in that very house when it was Allen's, as Pope was standing talking carelessly, unconscious of the virtue that was stolen from him to make a little bit of paper a venerated relic.

title: Diary, reminiscences, and correspondence of Henry Crabb Robinson ...
author: Robinson, Henry Crabb
snippet: To Bath, then, she came, a little before Christmas, partly attracted perhaps by me, and still more by a certain Catholic Bishop Bains, residing at Prior Park, and her great friend.

title: Diary, reminiscences, and correspondence of Henry Crabb Robinson ...
author: Robinson, Henry Crabb
snippet: In one of the most delicious spots imaginable, fronting the glen, at the upper end of which is the uncongenial and ostentatious Prior Park, where Pope's Allen lived, but out of sight of the deforming ornament, is Whitcomb Churchyard.
